-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | contravariant instances for * -> * types and operators.
--   
--   Contravariant instances for the fundamental * -&gt; * types and
--   operators.
@package star-to-star-contra
@version 1.0


-- | Yet another Cofunctor class declaration -- all the definitions on
--   hackage carry so much luggage (which mostly subsumes the rest of this
--   package)!
module Control.Functor.Contra
class Cofunctor f
cofmap :: Cofunctor f => (b -> a) -> f a -> f b


-- | Instances for the fundamental * -&gt; * types that require
--   contravariance. Another O is defined to disambiguate the two valid
--   Functor and Cofunctor instances.
module Data.StarToStar.Contra
newtype O f g a
O :: (f (g a)) -> O f g a
onO :: (f (g a) -> b) -> O f g a -> b
underO :: (f (g a) -> h (i b)) -> O f g a -> O h i b
toO :: f (g a) -> O f g a
fromO :: O f g a -> f (g a)
instance Cofunctor (ff (Fix ff)) => Cofunctor (Fix ff)
instance (Functor f, Cofunctor g) => Cofunctor (F f g)
instance (Cofunctor f, Functor g) => Functor (F f g)
instance (Cofunctor f, Cofunctor g) => Cofunctor (P f g)
instance (Cofunctor f, Cofunctor g) => Cofunctor (S f g)
instance (Cofunctor f, Functor g) => Cofunctor (O f g)
instance (Cofunctor f, Cofunctor g) => Functor (O f g)
instance (Functor f, Cofunctor g) => Cofunctor (O f g)
instance Cofunctor (K r)
instance Cofunctor (C b)
instance Cofunctor U
instance Cofunctor V
